problem_statement:
Support two-level collapsible menus in pages/toc:
# Overview

See as an example - https://framework.frictionlessdata.io/docs/guides/guides-overview/. This feature is usually required for sites/pages with much contents

# Plan

- [ ] make sidebars 300px
- [ ] remove vertical lines from link lists
- [ ] TBD
test_patch:
["diff --git a/tests/test_document.py b/tests/test_document.py
index a30d160..2eddaf9 100644
--- a/tests/test_document.py
+++ b/tests/test_document.py
@@ -74,7 +74,7 @@ def test_document_read():
     document.read()
     assert document.source == "index.md"
     assert document.target == "index.html"
-    assert document.config["pages"]["items"]
+    assert document.config["pages"]["list"]
     assert document.input.count("# Livemark")
     assert document.preface == ""
     assert document.content.count("# Livemark")
","diff --git a/tests/test_snippet.py b/tests/test_snippet.py
index fe8d99a..71c3e58 100644
--- a/tests/test_snippet.py
+++ b/tests/test_snippet.py
@@ -5,11 +5,11 @@ from livemark import Snippet
 
 
 def test_snippet():
-    snippet = Snippet("input", header=["python", "script", "output"])
-    assert snippet.header == ["python", "script", "output"]
+    snippet = Snippet("input", header=["python", "script"])
+    assert snippet.header == ["python", "script"]
     assert snippet.lang == "python"
     assert snippet.type == "script"
-    assert snippet.mode == "output"
+    assert snippet.props == {}
     assert snippet.input == "input"
     assert snippet.output is None
 
@@ -18,3 +18,9 @@ def test_snippet_update_output():
     snippet = Snippet("input", header=["python", "script"])
     snippet.output = "output"
     assert snippet.output == "output"
+
+
+def test_snippet_props():
+    snippet = Snippet("input", header=["python", "script", "name1", "name2=value2"])
+    assert snippet.props["name1"] is True
+    assert snippet.props["name2"] == "value2""]
